1.0.name: wordpress/volusion
1.0.description:
Easily link to your Volusion products from within WordPress

Once the plugin has been configured, you can easily embed product images using the WordPress Add an Image button. Adding product images has never been easier! (see the Screenshots section for an example).

Easy to link to your Volusion products.

You want to spend your time writing the best content, not hunting for the link for the product you're blogging about. This plugin is simple to set up, and powerful. If you use WordPress and Volusion, it's a must have.

Learn About Volusion

Volusion is the shopping cart used by President Obama's campaign and trusted by over 100,000 merchants.

Plugin Support

This plugin has been created by a Volusion partner - and is not an official Volusion plugin. If you have questions or comments about the plugin, please
